e="preserve">Junrey Balawing (;; born June 12, 1993 – July 28, 2020) was a Filipino record holder at the Guinness World Records for the world's shortest man alive measuring at tall. The declaration came during Balawing's 18th birthday celebration.
Guinness World Records official said Balawing broke the record of Khagendra Thapa Magar of Nepal, who was tall.
